name: ojs-db
description: A reactive framework to persist data in browser or anywhere

scripts.build: uglifyjs src/PromisePolyfill.js src/ArrayMap.js src/OjsUtils.js src/ChildRecord.js src/EventEmitter.js src/DbEvents.js src/SimpleDataSet.js src/DataSet.js src/DbProxies.js src/DbProxy.js src/LocalStorageProxy.js src/SQLiteProxy.js src/RestProxy.js src/DbSync.js src/DbFactory.js -o build/ojs-db.js -b -c --comments
scripts.minify: uglifyjs src/PromisePolyfill.js src/ArrayMap.js src/OjsUtils.js src/ChildRecord.js src/EventEmitter.js src/DbEvents.js src/SimpleDataSet.js src/DataSet.js src/DbProxies.js src/DbProxy.js src/LocalStorageProxy.js src/SQLiteProxy.js src/RestProxy.js src/DbSync.js src/DbFactory.js -o build/ojs-db.min.js -m -c --comments

author: Alan Thales Carvalho
